From: richard f allen <rfa007@...>

: :Hot Rod: :

Hot Rod is shocked, at the dream.
"Thats when Optimus Prime died! He and Megatron engaged in a one on one
battle. Prime had Mega down. Mega saw a gun, under some ruble, the Prime
didn't see. Mega asked for mercy, so he could buy time to get to the
gun. When Mega pleded, Prime said "I thought you were made of sterner
stuff." I saw Mega grab for the gun, and I jumped on him to stop him.
If I had stayed out of it, Prime could have finished him. But Megatron
held me as a hostage. "Out of the way Hot Rod!" Prime said. Megatron
grabed the gun, and shot Prime several times, yelling "FALL, FALL!"
Prime fell to the ground. Megatron through me aside, and walked to
Prime. "It's over Prime." Said Megatron. Prime nocked Megatron over the
edge, yelling "Never!!" I ran over to Prime, and asked him to forgive
me. He then went into stasis lock. He died later, in sickbay.
It was all my falt that Prime died. And I never forgave myself."
